modName: Prosperous Alchemist - Craft the most valuable potions
summary: Prosperous Alchemist will tell you the required ingredients for the most valuable potion you can make with the available ingredients in your inventory, for the most profit and the most alchemy experience earned.
descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES SKYRIM SCRIPT EXTENDER (SKSE)! Install SKSE from [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org[/url]

Boundless riches and experience await those who know how to use Alchemy effectively. But which potions to make? Prosperous Alchemist is there to help.

Proceed to any alchemy lab and Prosperous Alchemist will examine all  of your character\'s inventory for ingredients, analyze all possible recipes and tell you the most valuable potion  you could make with the ingredients you have, right in the alchemy crafting menu.

This will also tell you the best potions to make to level up your alchemy efficiently, since alchemy levels up according to the value of the potions you make.

No more need to browse websites for recipes or rely on apps that require you to input all your ingredients by hand. Prosperous Alchemist does it all in game.

* Displays detailed information on the best potion you can make with all its effects and required ingredients
* Displays the potion\'s expected value, accurate to the last septim
* Supports all ingredients in Hearthfire, Dragonborn and Dawnguard DLCs
* Supports any custom ingredients from other mods
* Takes into account your alchemy skill and all alchemy related perks
* Takes into account any alchemy boosting enchantments worn on your character
* Examines all 300,000 possible unique combination of ingredients within Skyrim+all DLCs

With this mod you can max out your alchemy skill effectively, without cheats, and use it as a valuable source of income!
author: Axxonite

files.name: The Prosperous Alchemist v1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed potential crash when rapidly creating potions.
Fixed crash when running with mods that add lots of ingredients.
